entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
